favorites.author: Zach Crizer
favorites.title: MLB playoffs: Astros slug three homers off Yankees bullpen, take ALCS Game 1 behind Justin Verlander gem - Yahoo Sports
favorites.description: The Astros have felled the Yankees in their last two ALCS appearances, and they took the first step toward winning a third in Game 1.
favorites.content:
The Astros walloped three home runs off the Yankees bullpen and Justin Verlander clicked into Cy Young form as Houston seized Game 1 of the ALCS, 4-2.
After an early exchange of runs, the teams ente… [+2644 chars]

favorites.title: Virat Kohli Reveals What MS Dhoni Texted Him During Lean Patch - NDTV Sports
favorites.description: Speaking on RCB Podcast, Kohli has revealed that Dhoni texted him during the lean patch and how the message "hit home" for him.
favorites.content: Right-handed batter Virat Kohli has been in sublime form in the ongoing T20 World Cup, registering three half-centuries. He played a match-winning knock of 82 runs against Pakistan, guiding India to … [+1548 chars]
